name: Dashni and the unfinished Ball Game
name_original: Dashni and the unfinished Ball Game
description:
A two player game of inter-worldly disco-ball volleyball, starring one blue rabbit from the pixel realm, and another  telepathic squid guy from the more-pixel realm.

This game was made in 2 days and therefore is half-baked and missing some features. (see: score keeping - just count yourselves for the time being ¯\_(ツ)_/¯).

Also you can punch each-other, just thought I'd mention it.

Controls:

Player 1 (Dashni):
Movement: WASD (Also supports AZERTY)
Jump: F
Attack (Directional): G

Player 2 (Squid Boi):
Movement: Arrows (Once again, AZERTY is supported)
Jump: . (The period near right-shift)
Attack (Directional): /

Fullscreen: F11

Credit Things:
High-res stuff: Sivan (i am#1739 on Discord)
Low-res stuff, code, and music: RedSponge

No HTML build because the performance was very poor and, well.. There are 25 minutes left to the jam at the time of writing this... actually it's 24 now.

Requirements: Java 8
